title: "Top Wall Street Strategist Warns Of Possible Market Bubble, Points To Tech Concentration In S&P 500 And AI Hype"
excerpt: "JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s chief market strategist and co-head of global research, Marko Kolanovic, issued a warning in a note released on Monday, stating that the S&P 500’s increasing levels of stock concentration, which have reached 60-year highs, may be suggestive of the emergence of a bubble."
